A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Luke was good. 
Rey was undermined.
Adam Driver's performance was as soulless as ever.
John Boyega and Kelly Marie Tran gave excellent performances.
A lot of unnecessary plot action occurs\, mostly involving Poe.
The main characters speak to each other mostly from across the divide\, which\, as a filmmaking technique is a very jarring and uncomfortable experience for the viewer.
